prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Elizabeth Barnard Nickels Papers, 1941-1990. Accession 44881, 45351. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Crown Collectibles, Chesterfield, Virginia, 2010.
